analyzed: uṣṇīse hi udayaḥ bhūyas pūrṇā vajramaṇau punar
sa virāgāt kalā hāniḥ jñāna hāniḥ na dehinām
mahā sukha svabhāvaḥ sya pūrṇā śabdena gīyate
anya bhāva antaram sarvam sṛṣṭi saṃhāra hetukam
bhavāt gacchati nirvāṇam tasmāt eti punarbhavam

original: svapakṣābhyāṃ yathāṃ candro 'yanābhyāṃ bhāskaro yathā // Sekoddeśa_111 //
analyzed: sva pakṣābhyām yathām candraḥ bhāskaraḥ yathā
pūrṇāyām niścalasya asya bhūmibhiḥ paripūrṇa tā
dvi ayuta dvi aṣṭa śataiḥ śvāsaiḥ akṣa rakṣaṇa bhakṣitaiḥ
pakṣa dvayam vyatikramya bhūmibhiḥ paripūritam
dvādaśa ākāra satya artham ṣoḍaśa ākāram akṣaram
bhūmibhiḥ dvādaśa ākāram pūritam paramā dvayam
kalābhiḥ pūritam cittam ṣoḍaśa ākāram akṣaram
ekārtham advayam dharmam paramārtham avinaśvaram

original: pūrṇāvasthāṃ gataṃ cittaṃ āsamantāt prapūritam // Sekoddeśa_115 //
analyzed: pūrṇa avasthām gatam cittam ā samantāt prapūritam
paripūrṇam asaṃkliṣṭam pakṣa dvayasya vāsanaiḥ
yathā nadī udakam viṣṭam samudre tat payaḥ samam
tathā bhāva samūhaḥ yam akṣare tad samaḥ kṣaraḥ
yathā dhātu samūhaḥ yam rasa tvam yāti bhakṣitaḥ

original: bījairbījasva bhāvaṃ ca phalakāle mānavarjitam // Sekoddeśa_118 //
analyzed: bījaiḥ bījasva bhāvam ca phala kāle māna varjitam
evam bhāva samūhaḥ pi parama akṣara bhakṣitaḥ
parama akṣara tām yāti sarva ākāra sva rūpa dhṛk

original: na daṃśe vedanāṃ vetti nānyatra cāpi daṣṭakaḥ /
analyzed: na daṃśe vedanām vetti na anyatra ca api daṣṭakaḥ

original: na viṣayānindriyadvāraiḥ pūrṇāvasthāṃ viṣe gate // Sekoddeśa_120 //
analyzed: na viṣaya anindriya dvāraiḥ pūrṇa avasthām viṣe gate

original: evaṃ na ca maṇau yogī nānyatra vetti satsukham /
analyzed: evam na ca maṇau yogī na anyatra vetti sat sukham
na viṣayān indriya dvāraiḥ citte pūrṇa kalām gate
yathā loha eka deśe saṃsthitaḥ hi mahārasaḥ
loham tīvra agni saṃtaptam vedhayet āsamantataḥ
tethā eva eka pradeśe saṃsthitam sukham akṣaram
cittam kāma agni saṃtaptam vedhayet āsamantataḥ

original: yathā ca viddhalohānāṃ naiva malo bhavet kvacit /
analyzed: yathā ca viddha lohānām nā eva malaḥ bhavet kvacid

original: tathā ca viddhacittānāṃ na vāsanā bhavet kvacit // Sekoddeśa_124 //
analyzed: tathā ca viddha cittānām na vāsanā bhavet kvacid

original: hematvaṃ hi gataṃ lohamagninā nirmalaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: hema tvam hi gatam loham agninā nirmalam bhavet

original: bhūyo bhūyastathā cittaṃ nirmalaṃ rāgavahninā // Sekoddeśa_125 //
analyzed: bhūyas bhūyas tathā cittam nirmalam rāga vahninā
yathā mahā maṇi sparśāt yāti śīlā pradīpta tām
tathā akṣara sukha sparśāt sukha tām cittam eti vai
kim atra bahunā uktena loka saṃvṛti satyataḥ
avitarkyaḥ rasa sadbhāvaḥ lohasya āvedhanam prati
vitarkyaḥ jñāna sadbhāvaḥ kim punar paramārthataḥ
mala āgantuka liptasya cittasya āvedhanam prati
na āgantukaḥ malaḥ citte na cittāt cirakālikaḥ

original: na cittena vinā jāto na citte saṃsthito 'vyayaḥ // Sekoddeśa_129 //
analyzed: na cittena vinā jātaḥ na citte saṃsthitaḥ vyayaḥ
yadi āgantukaḥ eva syāt cittam prāk amalam tadā

original: cirakālī yadā cittāttasyaiva sambhavaḥ kutaḥ // Sekoddeśa_130 //
analyzed: cira kālī yadā cittāt tasya eva sambhavaḥ kutas

original: yadi cittaṃ vinā jātastadā khakusumaṃ yathā /
analyzed: yadi cittam vinā jātaḥ tadā kha kusumam yathā

original: yadi sthitaḥ sadā citte na naśyet sarvatastadā // Sekoddeśa_131 //
analyzed: yadi sthitaḥ sadā citte na naśyet sarvatas tadā
tāmrasya kālimā yadvat rasa yogena naśyati

original: na tasya sattvatā naśyennirmalatvena yā sthitā // Sekoddeśa_132 //
analyzed: na tasya sattva tā naśyet nirmala tvena yā sthitā
tadvat citta malaḥ śūnyatā yogena praṇaśyati

original: na tasya jñānatā naśyennirmalatvena yā sthitā // Sekoddeśa_133 //
analyzed: na tasya jñāna tā naśyet nirmala tvena yā sthitā

original: rasaviddho yathā loho na punarlohatāṃ vrajet /
analyzed: rasa viddhaḥ yathā lohaḥ na punar loha tām vrajet

original: sukhaviddhaṃ tathā cittaṃ na punarduḥkhatāṃ vrajet // Sekoddeśa_134 //
analyzed: sukha viddham tathā cittam na punar duḥkha tām vrajet

original: na virāgāt paraṃ pāpaṃ na puṇyaṃ sukhataḥ param /
analyzed: na virāgāt param pāpam na puṇyam sukhataḥ param

original: ato 'kṣarasukhe cittaṃ veśanīyaṃ sadā nṛpa // Sekoddeśa_135 //
analyzed: atas kṣara sukhe cittam veśanīyam sadā nṛpa

original: vaktuṃ na śakyate saukhyaṃ kumāryā surataṃ vinā /
analyzed: vaktum na śakyate saukhyam kumāryā suratam vinā

original: yauvane surataṃ prāpya svato vetti mahāsukham // Sekoddeśa_136 //
analyzed: yauvane suratam prāpya svatas vetti mahā sukham

original: evaṃ na śakyate vaktuṃ samādhirahitaiḥ sukham /
analyzed: evam na śakyate vaktum samādhi rahitaiḥ sukham

original: samādhāvakṣaraṃ prāpya svato vindanti yoginaḥ // Sekoddeśa_137 //
analyzed: samādhau akṣaram prāpya svatas vindanti yoginaḥ
akṣara ja sukha jñāne sarvajñaiḥ api śaṃkyate

original: tathā kvacinna kartavyo virāgo manaso 'sukhāt // Sekoddeśa_138 //
analyzed: tathā kvacid na kartavyaḥ virāgaḥ sukhāt
cyuteḥ virāga saṃbhūtiḥ virāgāt duḥkha saṃbhavaḥ

original: duḥkhāddhātukṣayaḥ puṃsāṃ kṣayān mṛtyuriti smṛtaḥ // Sekoddeśa_139 //
analyzed: duḥkhāt dhātu kṣayaḥ puṃsām kṣayāt mṛtyuḥ iti smṛtaḥ
mṛtyoḥ punarbhavaḥ teṣām bhavāt mṛtyuḥ cyutiḥ punar

original: evaṃ virāgasaṃbhūteḥ sattvānāṃ nānyathā bhavaḥ // Sekoddeśa_140 //
analyzed: evam virāga saṃbhūteḥ sattvānām na anyathā bhavaḥ
tasmāt sarva prayatnena cyuti rāgam vivarjayet
yena akṣara sukham yāti yogī saṃsāra bandhanāt
virāgāt na kāmaśāstram samīhate

original: mayokte kiṃ punastantre yogī duḥkhaṃ samīhate // Sekoddeśa_142 //
analyzed: mayā ukte kim punar tantre yogī duḥkham samīhate
śukra akṣara svabhāvena sādhayet parama akṣaram
ādhāre cyutim āpanne ādheyasya virāga tā
ādhāra ādheya saṃbandhaḥ yāvat na akṣara tām vrajet
cittam akṣara tā prāptam na ādhāra ādheya lakṣaṇam
akṣara udbhava kāyasya ūrṇṇā cakra gatasya tu
āli kāli samāyogaḥ hūṃkāraḥ nā iṣyate nṛpa
bimbam śūnya udbhavam hetuḥ phalam akṣara jam sukham

original: phalena mudrito heturhetunā mudritaṃ phalam // Sekoddeśa_146 //
analyzed: phalena mudritaḥ hetuḥ hetunā mudritam phalam
śūnyatā bimba dhṛk hetuḥ karuṇā akṣara dhṛk phalam
śūnyatā karuṇā bhinnam bodhi cittam tat acyutam
nirvāṇa rahitam bimbam saṃsāra atītam akṣaram
paraḥ
abhāvaḥ na asti bimbasya abhāva udbhūta lakṣaṇāt
bhāvaḥ na asti akṣarasya api bhāva sambhūta lakṣaṇāt
bhāva abhāva samāyogaḥ vajra yogaḥ paraḥ
rūpa arūpa vinirmuktaḥ pratisenā iva darpaṇe
bimbam na bhavam āyāti nā api nirvāṇam akṣaram
anyonya āliṅgitam śāntam napuṃsaka padam param
prajñā hetoḥ ajāta tvāt prajñā hetu udbhavam phalam
prajñā hetoḥ ajāta tvāt prajñā jātam na hetu jam
atas na hetu jam jñānam prajñā jñānam anuttaram
phalena hetunā anyonyam na parasparam udraṇam

original: hetuḥ phalaṃ ca yat sarvaṃ tat pratītyasamudbhavam /
analyzed: hetuḥ phalam ca yat sarvam tat pratītyasamudbhavam

original: anyonyamudritaṃ bimbaṃ notpannaṃ na ca nirvṛtam // Sekoddeśa_154 //
analyzed: anyonya mudritam bimbam na utpannam na ca nirvṛtam
prajñā ca atyanta nirvṛtā utpannaḥ ca kṣaraḥ
hetu phala vinirmuktiḥ na paraspara mudraṇam
a jātasya a niruddhasya yat jñeyasya iha darśanam
tat sva cittasya na anyasya bāhya jñeya vibhāgataḥ

original: ato na cātmanātmānaṃ mudrituṃ śakyate kvacit /
analyzed: atas na ca ātmanā ātmānam mudritum śakyate kvacid
kim chinatti mahā khaḍgaḥ ātmānam ātma dhārayā
bandhyāduhitṛ saṃgena svapne saukhyam yathā bhavet
gagana udbhava bimbena sevitena tathā ātmanaḥ

original: na prajñā nāpyupāyo 'sau sahajaḥ prajñayā saha /
analyzed: na prajñā na api upāyaḥ sau sahajaḥ prajñayā saha
āpūrṇaḥ ca eva saukhyena sarva āvaraṇa varjitaḥ
ākāśa vat nirāvaraṇaḥ viṣaya indriya varjitaḥ
sarvatas sarva bhūta stha acchedyaḥ bheda varjitaḥ
svayambhūḥ vajrasattvaḥ sau mahārthaḥ parama akṣaraḥ
bodhisattvaḥ mahā dveṣaḥ kleśa kṣayī mahā ripuḥ
vajram abhedyam iti āha mahārtham bhagavān iha
sattvam tri bhavasya eka tā tat uktam paramākṣaram
parama akṣara sukha āpūrṇaḥ bhūmibhiḥ paripūritaḥ
bodhau vyavasthitaḥ sattvaḥ bodhisattvaḥ tatas calaḥ
kleśa ādi dveṣa saṃghānām mahā dveṣaḥ mahā ripuḥ
samayaḥ candra amṛtam śukram acyutiḥ tasya bhakṣaṇam
eka tvam sarva vajrāṇām prajñā kāya akṣaraiḥ saha
mahā krodhaḥ mahā śatruḥ mārāṇām krodha rūpiṇām
mahā akṣara sukha upāyāt sattva artham na tyajet kvacid
sattvān moktum mahā lobhaḥ kṣara lobha niṣūdanaḥ
ete hi uktāḥ ṣaṣ ākārāḥ akṣara jñāna vedanā
vijñāna rūpa saṃskāra saṃjñāḥ skandha kulāni te
jñāna agni ambara pṛthivī vāyu udakāḥ yathākramam
manaḥ cakṣuḥ śruti kāya nāsa jihvāḥ tathā eva ca
śabda rasa dharmadhātuka gandha spraṣṭavya rūpiṇaḥ

original: krodharāṭ ṣaṇmukho bhīmaḥ ṣaṭkulaiḥ pariśodhitaḥ // Sekoddeśa_172 //
analyzed: krodha rāj ṣaṇmukhaḥ bhīmaḥ ṣaṣ kulaiḥ pariśodhitaḥ
kāya guhya indriya cittam trividham maṇḍalam sadā
idam sekasya sādhanam parama akṣara sādhanam
nāḍī kula samāyuktam uddeśāt candra bhāṣitam
iti śrī seka uddeśaḥ samāptaḥ
